page.title: 18LAW / GOVERNMENT / RELIGION
page.content: The community Policeman for Trenance, Mawgan Porth,St Mawgan and Trevarrian is P.C. Biggins,who comes from St Columb Police Station (not permanently manned).He comes to the area for 1 hour a day,every day,. Summer and Winter but normally more in the summer.{GOVERNMENT:}St Mawgan Parish Council is our parish council.They have monthly meetings to discuss local topics.There is a high turn out to vote for nine councillors who serve a 4 year term.The county council is Restormel.The present councillor for the area is Liberal Independent reflecting the politics of the area. {RELIGION:}People in our area wishing to worship can choose between these places:St Mawgan Methodist Church which does not have a resident Parson but is served by local preachers, St Mawgan Church which has its own priest
